name: The Billy Mays Ultimate Fighter
description:
You are Billy Mays. You fight the demons who are lead by Anthony Sullivan. At first Billy Mays thought he wasn't long for this world; Until, he meet Anthony Sullivan. Fight as Billy Mays through hordes of Demonic Gargoyles controlled by the evil king of the world, Anthony Sullivan. Billy is our only hope.

Controls:

WASD - Movement

Mouse - Aiming

1 - Flashlight on

2 - Flashlight off

M - Cursor on/off
